attributes.action: Demand a 'Vote of No Confidence' in the Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details: All this comes to light after Mr Cameron has spent 6 years telling us we must all pay our way and that 'we are all in this together'. The Prime Minister has lost any credibility and should not be leading this country.
attributes.background: David Cameron has now admitted benefiting from money invested in off shore funds. He previously described such activities as "morally wrong". The Prime Minister also refused to reveal this for a number of days despite repeated questioning. The country deserves better from its Prime Minister.
